appDesc.message: Easily sync your Shazam tracks with a Spotify playlist
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

shazamLoginSuccessOpenAgain.message: Shazam login is successful. Please open Shazify again.

introWelcomeText.message:
In just a few seconds, your Shazam tags will be synched with Spotify.

First, we need to connect
to Shazam and Spotify services.

introShazamLoggedOutText.message:
First, we need to be logged in on Shazam.

Open the login page and click on the « Login » button.

Once done, you can open Shazify again.

introShazamLoggedInText.message:
Congratulations !

You have successfully logged in to Shazam.

Now, let’s go to the next step...

introSpotifyLoggedOutText.message:
Finally, you need to let us create and manage a Spotify playlist.

Click on the following button, and then follow the onscreen instructions.

introSpotifyLoggedInText.message:
We are now ready to
sync your Shazam tags
with Spotify.

The first sync will start now.

Then, when you need to update your tags, just
open the extension again.

updatingApp.message: Shazify is updating to latest version...

doNotCloseBrowser.message: Please do not close your browser

trackNotFound.message: Oops ! We cannot find this track on Spotify... Please check/correct the search query below and then select the right track from the results that will be displayed.

changeTrackSearch.message: Not the right track found? You can change the search query below and then select the right track from the results that will be displayed.

noTrackFoundQuery.message: No track found... please change fields above and try again.

searchResultsPleaseSelect.message: Please select the right track below

promptShazamLogin.message: Please connect on MyShazam's website before we can fetch your tags.

promptSpotifyLogin.message: Please let Shazify access your Spotify account to create and manage a new playlist.

spotifyLoginSuccess.message: You have successfully logged in to Spotify.

shazamLoginSuccess.message: You have successfully logged in to Shazam.

clearDataText.message: If you have some troubles with the extension, you can clear all it's stored data here.

exportLogsText.message: If you need to debug the extension, you can export the logs here.

recreatePlaylistText.message: If the Spotify playlist became messy and you want to recreate the tracks it contains. We will reorder all the tracks too, and put the latest at top. We only change the playlist created by Shazify, nothing else will be modified.

recreatePlaylistAreYouSure.message: Are you sure you want to recreate all tracks in playlist?
